MODEL_PREDICTION.ODE:
DAE = DRUG
            DSIZE = TUMOUR
            PD = 1-DAE/(AE50+DAE)
            DRUG = ode(deriv = -KPD*DRUG)
            TUMOUR = ode(deriv = (RIN*PD-DSIZE*KOVER)*DSIZE, init = SIZE0)

tumour_size_ORG_mdl.INDIVIDUAL_VARIABLES:
SIZE0 = GSIZE0*exp(eta_PPV_SIZE0)
        GTOVER = POP_TOVER*168
        TOVER = GTOVER*exp(eta_PPV_TOVER)
        GAE50 = POP_AE50/263*1000
        AE50 = GAE50*exp(eta_PPV_AE50)
        GTEQ = POP_TEQ*168
        TEQ = GTEQ
        KOVER = 1/TOVER
        RIN = SIZE0*KOVER
        KPD = ln(2)/TEQ
        S1 = 1
